TopicTitle: Mod for Integrating Kerbal Experience into Other Mods

Articles.Content:
So, AFAIK, Squad has said they arent interested in ever creating an autopilot. As such, it's obviously not possible that squad will ever incorporate such things into pilot experience.

I was wondering if anyone thought of writing a mod to integrate it?

For instance:

Level 0 pilots have SAS stability

Level 1 can point at all 6 primary directions

Level 2 can point at AND execute maneuver nodes (using mechjeb)

Level 3 can execute ascents and orbital insertion (using MechJeb)

Level 4 can execute transfers (using MechJeb)

Level 5 can execute targeted landings and docking (using MechJeb)

Or something of the sort?

Furthermore, perhaps engineers, rather than gaining piloting skills, can gain access to information from MechJeb and/or use of Kerbal Attachment System (KAS), for instance:

Level 0 engineers can fix broken parts

Level 1 can use Kerbal Attachment System

Level 2 has access to transfer windows (using MechJeb)

Level 3 can see trajectory in flight (to make manual targeted landings easier)

Level 4 (need ideas?)

Level 5 (need ideas?)

What do you guys think? Other ideas to make this mod better?

This wouldn't be a standalone mod, but rather MechJeb and KAS would have to be modified.

In fact KAS has been partially replaced by KIS which does require Engineers (KAS will also be updated). EPL requires engineers and the level matters.

So basically.. if you can think of a way that a mod could be enhanced by checking Kerbal skills (or SAS availability), then petition that mod to do so. Or better yet contribute a patch.
